plot: Isabel and Andre have been living together for two years, the relation is not at its best. Isabel is unemployed and unwilling to move on, when she discovers she's pregnant, André leaves her...
title: Sem Amor, o Sangue Não Precisa Mais de Correr
plot_es: Isabel and Andre have been living together for two years, the relation is not at its best. Isabel is unemployed and unwilling to move on, when she discovers she's pregnant, André leaves her...
original_name: Sem Amor, o Sangue Não Precisa Mais de Correr
